channel.title: Animations
channel.description:
Hey everybody. I'm not entirely sure if this should be in graphics or somewhere else, so I just put it here. Anyways, I'm wondering what programs are used to make animated videos such as this one.
[youtube]http://m.youtube.com/watch?v=YSdJtNen-EA[/youtube]
So if someone could lead me in the right direction by helping me figure put which programs to use and any other tips. Thanks!!

item.title: Animations
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:6, topic:538178”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=657002.msg4396031#msg4396031 date=1389143029]
Just bear in mind that the YouTube video that you linked was most likely made by a large studio
[/quote]
if you don’t know what clash of clans is…

jesus noooo :([/quote]

It has 10,000,000 - 50,000,000 downloads, what I was saying is that the video was most likely made by a large team as Supercell makes a reported 2.4 million dollars a day from Clash of Clans

Read full topic

item.title: Animations
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

The Wanderer:

Blender would be your best bet in the free modeling programs. Check out the modeling section or the graphics section. You have to create a 3D mesh and then rig it with an armature so that way you can do animations. Just Google 3d animations and look for some tutorials on YouTube.

Thanks for the advice bro!

Read full topic

item.title: Animations
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Blender would be your best bet in the free modeling programs. Check out the modeling section or the graphics section. You have to create a 3D mesh and then rig it with an armature so that way you can do animations. Just Google 3d animations and look for some tutorials on YouTube.
